TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignInRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

summary.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

span.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-同盟登入訊息會要求安全性權杖，信賴憑證者合作對象 (RP) 傳送給安全性權杖服務 (STS)。A WS-Federation sign-in message is sent by a relying party (RP) to a security token service (STS) to request a security token. Wa 參數必須設定為"wsignout1.0 」 和 wtrealm 參數應該設定為要求之資源 （通常是要求之資源的 URL） 的安全性領域。The wa parameter must be set to "wsignout1.0" and the wtrealm parameter should be set to the security realm of the requested resource (this is often the URL of the requested resource). 也可以在要求中指定其他選擇性參數。Other optional parameters may also be specified in the request. A訊息的建立方式的靜態方法類別，例如方法，當 wa 參數設定為"wsignin1.0"，沒有任何 wresult 或 wresultptr 參數存在及 wtrealm 參數或wreply 參數會出現。A message is created by the static methods of the class, for example the method, when the wa parameter is set to "wsignin1.0", there is no wresult or wresultptr parameter present, and either a wtrealm parameter or a wreply parameter is present. > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓 wtrealm 參數框線或要設定 wreply 參數 （或兩者都有） 登入訊息。不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定已指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 類別會公開數個可用來設定或存取個別訊息參數的屬性。The class exposes several properties that can be used to set or access individual message parameters. 這些參數也可以設定或透過存取字典。These parameters can also be set or accessed through the dictionary. 例如，您可以讀取訊息中的 wtrealm 參數是屬性或當做索引鍵指定"wtrealm"字典。For example, you can read the wtrealm parameter in the message either through the property or by specifying "wtrealm" as the key to the dictionary. [!INCLUDE[wif_wsfed_ref](~/includes/wif-wsfed-ref-md.md)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSignInMessage#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsigninmessage/cs/webapplication1/default.aspx.cs#2)]

summary.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

span.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wa 訊息參數 (屬性) 會初始化為"wsignin1.0"。The wa message parameter (the property) is initialized to "wsignin1.0". 支援非標準的訊息建立回溯相容性。Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility. 在典型的情況下，您必須指定 wtrealm 訊息參數。In the typical case, a wtrealm message parameter must be specified. 這個建構函式可讓您只 wreply 訊息參數指定回溯相容性的 Active Directory 同盟服務 (AD FS) 1.0 版。This constructor allows only a wreply message parameter to be specified for backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Service (AD FS) version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.
The authentication type.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 參數就像是在 Ws-trust 中定義的 wst:AuthenticationType 項目。The wauth parameter is like the wst:AuthenticationType element defined in WS-Trust. 值應該設定為字串，包含 URI，識別所使用的驗證類型。The value should be set to a string that contains a URI that identifies the type of authentication that is used. Wauth 參數是選擇性的。The wauth parameter is optional. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wauth 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wauth parameter from the message.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

span.span: The value of the wct parameter specified as a datetime string in UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wct 參數會指定訊息已建立的瞬間的目前時間。The wct parameter specifies the current time at the instant that the message was created. Wct 參數是選擇性的。The wct parameter is optional. 設定為屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wct 的參數。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wct parameter from the message.

The value of the wfed parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfed 參數會指定訊息的同盟內容。The wfed parameter specifies the federation context for the message. Wfed 參數是選擇性的。The wfed parameter is optional. 設定為屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wfed 參數。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wfed parameter from the message.

member this.Freshness : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.
The value of the wfresh parameter.

value.span: 這應該是整數，表示為字串。

span.span: This should be an integer represented as a string.

value.span: 它指定最長使用期限驗證都有效的分鐘數。

span.span: It specifies the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid.

value.span: 零表示在核發權杖之前，會提示使用者。

span.span: Zero indicates that the user should be prompted before the token is issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfresh 參數指出驗證是有效的分鐘中的最長使用期限。The wfresh parameter indicates the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid. Wfresh 參數是選擇性的。The wfresh parameter is optional. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wfresh 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wfresh parameter from the message.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a string representation of an integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Whr 參數識別的身分識別提供者要求所使用的安全性領域。The whr parameter identifies the security realm of the identity provider to use for the request. 它可以指定為要使用 IP STS 的 URL 或了解要求的收件者的識別項。It can be specified as the URL of the IP-STS to use or as an identifier that is understood by the receiver of the request. Whr 參數是選擇性組屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 whr 參數。The whr parameter is optional Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the whr parameter from the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別要用於要求的原則。Identifies the policy to be used for the request. 通常適用於動作 （wa 參數），但可能會更廣泛的影響。It typically applies to the action (wa parameter), but may have broader implications. Wp 參數是選擇性的。The wp parameter is optional. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wp 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wp parameter from the message.

summary.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.
The value of the wtrealm parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wtrealm 參數會指定屬於要求之資源的安全性領域。The wtrealm parameter specifies the security realm to which the requested resource belongs. 這通常是要求之資源的 URL。This is often the URL of the requested resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓 wtrealm 參數框線或要設定 wreply 參數 （或兩者都有） 登入訊息。不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定已指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wtrealm 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wtrealm parameter from the message.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Reply { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Reply : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
The value of the wreply parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含回應應該導向的 URI。Contains the URI to which responses should be directed. Wtrealm 參數通常用來指定此 URI。The wtrealm parameter is often used to specify this URI. 不過，在更複雜的情況下，wtrealm 參數可以用來指定要求，例如整個網站的安全性領域，而且 wreply 參數可以用來指定，例如文件、 頁面上，該領域內特定資源或端點。However, in more complex scenarios, the wtrealm parameter can be used to specify the security realm for the request, for example, the entire web site, and the wreply parameter can be used to specify a specific resource within that realm, for example, a document, page, or endpoint. Wreply 參數是選擇性的。The wreply parameter is optional. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wreply 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message. > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓 wtrealm 參數框線或要設定 wreply 參數 （或兩者都有） 登入訊息。不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定已指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreq 參數指定使用的權杖要求``項目或完整的要求訊息 Ws-trust 中所述。The wreq parameter specifies a token request using either a `` element or a full request message as described in WS-Trust. Wreq 參數是選擇性的。The wreq parameter is optional. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wreq 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreq parameter from the message. 如果指定屬性，無法指定屬性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

Wreqptr 參數是選擇性的。The wreqptr parameter is optional. 設定屬性`null`或空字串，以從訊息移除 wreqptr 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreqptr parameter from the message. 如果指定屬性，無法指定屬性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓 wtrealm 參數框線或要設定 wreply 參數 （或兩者都有） 登入訊息。不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定已指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.
